import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import HeaderComponent from "./HeaderComponent"; import { getLiveAuctionListAction } from '../Redux/Actions/Actions' function LiveAuctionDetails(props) { const lotData = [ { 'id': '1', 'title': 'Secondary By - A1', 'company': 'C1', 'lotAt': 'Location1', 'qty': '100', 'lots': '30', 'price': '300', 'date': '10-10-2022', 'start': '10:30am', 'end': '11:30am', 'status': 'ready stock', 'startprice': '30000', 'increement': '50', 'materialAt': 'MATERIAL ATKALMESHWAR', 'madAt': 'MADEIN KALMESHWAR, MAHARASHTRA', 'status': 'READY STOCK', 'winner': 'a11', }, { 'id': '1', 'title': 'Secondary By - A1', 'company': 'C1', 'lotAt': 'Location1', 'qty': '100', 'lots': '30', 'price': '300', 'date': '10-10-2022', 'start': '10:30am', 'end': '11:30am', 'status': 'ready stock', 'startprice': '30000', 'increement': '50', 'materialAt': 'MATERIAL ATKALMESHWAR', 'madAt': 'MADEIN KALMESHWAR, MAHARASHTRA', 'status': 'READY STOCK', 'winner': 'a11', }, { 'id': '1', 'title': 'Secondary By - A1', 'company': 'C1', 'lotAt': 'Location1', 'qty': '100', 'lots': '30', 'price': '300', 'date': '10-10-2022', 'start': '10:30am', 'end': '11:30am', 'status': 'ready stock', 'startprice': '30000', 'increement': '50', 'materialAt': 'MATERIAL ATKALMESHWAR', 'madAt': 'MADEIN KALMESHWAR, MAHARASHTRA', 'status': 'READY STOCK', 'winner': 'a11', }, { 'id': '1', 'title': 'Secondary By - A1', 'company': 'C1', 'lotAt': 'Location1', 'qty': '100', 'lots': '30', 'price': '300', 'date': '10-10-2022', 'start': '10:30am', 'end': '11:30am', 'status': 'ready stock', 'startprice': '30000', 'increement': '50', 'materialAt': 'MATERIAL ATKALMESHWAR', 'madAt': 'MADEIN KALMESHWAR, MAHARASHTRA', 'status': 'READY STOCK', 'winner': 'a11', }, ]; const [liveAuctioList, setLiveAuctionList] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { props.getLiveAuctionList() }, []) useEffect(() => { if (props.liveAuctionList?.auction) { setLiveAuctionList(props.liveAuctionList.auction) } }, [props.liveAuctionList]) console.log(liveAuctioList) return ( <>
COATED BY JSW Live Lots Qty : 600
{liveAuctioList && liveAuctioList.map(auction =>
{auction.title}

)}
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { liveAuctionList: state.getLiveAuctionListAction.liveAuctionList, } } const mapDispatchtoProps = { getLiveAuctionList: () => getLiveAuctionListAction(), } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchtoProps)(LiveAuctionDetails)
